                                 Release Notes

This has been re uploaded due to there bein no ending on original scene release,to the peeps who downloaded my first,what a waste of bandwidth for you and me hey,never mind its here now :)enjoy and seed


When rebellious street dancer Andie lands at the elite Maryland School of the 
Arts, she finds herself fighting to fit in while also trying to hold onto her 
old life. When she joins forces with the school&#039;s hottest dancer Chase to form a 
crew of classmate outcasts to compete in Baltimore&#039;s underground dance battle 
The Streets, she ultimately finds a way to live her dream while building a 
bridge between her two separate worlds.
